languages.text: "Не могу порекомендовать. Мясо этих ксеносов пропитано скверной и немощью. А еще дурными препаратами, которые они вводят в свою кровь в ненормальных количествах".
"I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."
languages.original_text: "Не могу порекомендовать. Мясо этих ксеносов пропитано скверной и немощью. А еще дурными препаратами, которые они вводят в свою кровь в ненормальных количествах".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

"I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

languages.text: “我不打算推荐这种食物。这些异形的肉浸泡在腐化与毒素之中，血液中还注入了大量的秽物。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算推荐这种食物。这些异形的肉浸泡在腐化与毒素之中，血液中还注入了大量的秽物。”

languages.text: 「おすすめはできないな。この異種族の血は芯まで腐敗して虚弱だ。それに、奴らの血には不潔な物質が大量に注入されている」
languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

traits.locale_text: 「おすすめはできないな。この異種族の血は芯まで腐敗して虚弱だ。それに、奴らの血には不潔な物質が大量に注入されている」

languages.text: «No la recomiendo. La carne de estos xenos es rica en corrupción y fragilidad, por no hablar de las diversas inmundicias que se inyectan en grandes cantidades».
languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

traits.locale_text: «No la recomiendo. La carne de estos xenos es rica en corrupción y fragilidad, por no hablar de las diversas inmundicias que se inyectan en grandes cantidades».

languages.text: « Je ne vous le recommanderais pas. La viande de ces xénos est imprégnée de corruption et de faiblesse, ainsi que des infâmes substances qu'ils s'injectent en grande quantité. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le recommanderais pas. La viande de ces xénos est imprégnée de corruption et de faiblesse, ainsi que des infâmes substances qu'ils s'injectent en grande quantité. »

languages.text: "Ich kann es nicht empfehlen. Das Fleisch dieser Xenos ist voller Verderbnis und Schwäche. Und diesen faulen Substanzen, die sie in großen Mengen in ihr Blut spritzen."
languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es nicht empfehlen. Das Fleisch dieser Xenos ist voller Verderbnis und Schwäche. Und diesen faulen Substanzen, die sie in großen Mengen in ihr Blut spritzen."

languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

languages.text: "Önermem. Bu zenoların etleri, yozlaşma ve zayıflığa bulanmış. Kanlarına bol miktarda enjekte ettikleri o iğrenç maddeler de cabası."
languages.original_text: "I cannot recommend it. The meat of these xenos is steeped in corruption and frailty. As well as the foul substances they inject into their blood in vast quantities."

traits.locale_text: "Önermem. Bu zenoların etleri, yozlaşma ve zayıflığa bulanmış. Kanlarına bol miktarda enjekte ettikleri o iğrenç maddeler de cabası."
